page.title: 05Brands Hatch and traffic
page.content:
Although the{M20 motorway}passes within 200 metres of the circuit there is no exit which directly serves {Brands Hatch.
The{A20 trunk road}passes the west entrance to the circuit but the east entrance can only be accessed from local minor roads and it is this entrance which is used by competitors and most spectators. {Car parking}is provided in fields with access off the local road,{Scratchers Lane.
On big race days{traffic congestion}is very bad. Cars are parked everywhere there is space, up to two kilometres away from the track. {Police}have to control every junction for up to five kilometres around. Clearing the{car {parks}can take up to four hours from the end of the race.
